Author: Traditional_Entry627

Comment: A corporation is legally considered a separate entity. No one technically ever owns a corporation. They just control it. What you're referring to is a majority shareholder... still technically not the owner. In practice, the largest shareholder/controlling interest is usually called the owner. Most people would say Musk owns Tesla...
